name: Calumet Specialty Products Partners, L.P.
description: Calumet Specialty Products Partners, L.P. is a leading independent producer of specialty hydrocarbon products in North America. The company, founded in 1916, operates a diverse portfolio of manufacturing facilities across the United States, producing a wide range of products including high-quality lubricating oils, solvents, and other specialty products that serve various industries such as automotive, industrial, and consumer markets. With a strong emphasis on sustainability and innovation, Calumet focuses on delivering customized solutions to meet the specific needs of its customers while adhering to the highest safety and environmental standards. The company’s extensive distribution network enables it to effectively serve its clients and expand its market presence. Calumet’s strategic initiatives include optimizing production processes, enhancing product offerings, and investing in research and development to drive growth and enhance operational efficiency. With a commitment to excellence and a customer-centric approach, Calumet Specialty Products Partners continues to be a trusted partner in the specialty products industry, dedicated to providing innovative solutions that contribute to the success of its customers.

seo.meta_title: Calumet Specialty Products Partners, L.P. | Specialty Hydrocarbon Products
seo.meta_description: Explore Calumet Specialty Products, a leading independent producer of specialty hydrocarbon products. Learn about our innovative solutions and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What products does Calumet produce?
faq.answer: Calumet produces lubricating oils, solvents, waxes, and other specialty hydrocarbon products.

faq.question: Where is Calumet headquartered?
faq.answer: Calumet is headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana, USA.
